entry.title: Cola Boyy ‘Walk Again’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Cola Boyy ‘Walk Again’

 Best New Music

Disco innovator and disability rights activist Cola Boyy ’s posthumous sophomore album, Quit To Play Chess, serves as a soundtrack against ableism and inequality.

May 12

entry.title: Brian Eno + Beatie Wolfe: ‘What We Are’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Brian Eno + Beatie Wolfe: ‘What We Are’

 Best New Music

Ambient music pioneer, visual artist, and thinker Brian Eno teams up with conceptual artist and composer Beatie Wolfe for two new albums coming to us on June 6.

May 9

entry.title: Chicarica: ‘Parará’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Chicarica: ‘Parará’

 Best New Music

Chilean synthpop trio Chicarica (Rich Girl) give us an enticing lead in to their sophomore album Invierno en la playa, due May 30th.

May 8

entry.title: Fitz & The Tantrums: ‘Ruin The Night’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Fitz & The Tantrums: ‘Ruin The Night’

 Best New Music

We first caught up with Fitz & The Tantrums back in 2009 when they played live on Morning Becomes Eclectic around the release of their debut album Songs For A Breakup: Volume 1.

May 7

entry.title: The Brudi Brothers: ‘Me More Cowboy Than You’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
The Brudi Brothers: ‘Me More Cowboy Than You’

 Best New Music

Seattle-based Americana musicians and poets The Brudi Brothers have been friends and bandmates since they were kids.

May 6

entry.title: Stereolab: ‘Melodie Is A Wound’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Stereolab: ‘Melodie Is A Wound’

 Best New Music

“Melodie Is A Wound,” Stereolab’s second single ahead of their forthcoming LP Instant Holograms On Metal Film (their first in over 15 years!), is offering so much more than dulcet…

May 5

entry.title: Cass McCombs: ‘Priestess’ (Radio Edit) (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Cass McCombs: ‘Priestess’ (Radio Edit)

 Best New Music

NYC-based, indie-folk-rocking artist Cass McCombs shares “Priestess,” an economical requiem that cuts right to the chase and showcases his poignant songwriting.

May 2

entry.title: My Morning Jacket: ‘Out In The Open’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
My Morning Jacket: ‘Out In The Open’

 Best New Music

It’s hard to believe that My Morning Jacket is celebrating the release of their tenth studio album in 2025, 20 years after making their radio debut on Morning Becomes Eclectic in 2005…

May 1
